snippet: The woman said that when she saw a man masturbating in Central Park two weeks ago, she told a park ranger.
abstract: Woman who was raped by suspect David A Mitchell in Central Park contradicts news reports indicating that she had never reported an earlier encounter with Mitchell in which she had photographed him masturbating in the park's wooded Rambles area; 73-year-old victim tells reporters that, in fact, she had reported the incident immediately to a park ranger and provided the photo; information was not passed on to the police.

byline.original: By WENDY RUDERMAN and NATE SCHWEBER

lead_paragraph: The woman said that when she saw a man masturbating in Central Park two weeks ago, she told a park ranger.

headline.seo: Central Park Rape Victim Says She Reported Earlier Confrontation
headline.main: Rape Victim, 73, Says She Reported Earlier Confrontation With Suspect
headline.print_headline: Rape Victim, 73, Says She Reported Earlier Confrontation With the Suspect
